introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Sneaker Finder, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our website.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect the following information when you use our application:

items.0: Registration data: name, surname, email address, password
items.1: Technical data: IP address, device type, operating system
items.2: Usage data: search history, user preferences

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

items.0: Enabling the use of Sneaker Finder application
items.1: Customizing content and features to your preferences
items.2: Handling user requests and providing technical support
items.3: Conducting statistical analysis and improving application performance

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@sneakerfinder.com
